import React, { Component } from 'react' import PostService from '../../../service/post.service' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container' import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' class NewPost extends Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { title: '', content: '', genre: '', typology: '', cover: '', } this.newPostService = new PostService() } handleInputChange = e => { const { name, value } = e.target this.setState({ [name]: value }) } handleSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() console.log(this.state) this.newPostService.createPost(this.state, this.props.user._id) } // finishAction = () => { // this.props.hideModalWindow() // } render() { return ( <>
